name: Lake View Tavern
text:
Our newest dining destination in the historic lodge with a deck overlooking Lake Harmony. The perfect place to relax and enjoy a cold drink, good food and a beautiful view.

  • Monday: Closed
    Tuesday: Closed
    Wednesday: Closed

    5-9PM
    Friday & Saturday:
    5PM -10PM
